constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 42 (Wednesday, March 9, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. VELA:
H.R. 7052.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H1425]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1535 East Los Ebanos Boulevard in Brownsville, Texas, as the "1st Lieutenant Andres Zermeno Post Office Building".
